DOC.brief_summary: This single multiple ascend dose study first evaluation PF-0626414 , Selective Androgen Receptor Modulator human . The goal ass safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics healthy western Japanese male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study To Evaluate Safety And Tolerability Of Single And Multiple Ascending Doses Of PF- 06260414 In Healthy Western And Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male age 21 50 year , inclusive ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , 12 lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . Additional inclusion criterion subject enrol Japanese cohort : Japanese subject four Japanese grandparent born Japan . Serum total testosterone level < 270 > 1070 ng/dL Serum Prostate Specific Antigen ( PSA ) level > 4 ng/mL . Hematocrit > 48 % . eGFR > 150 ml/min/1.73m2 .
